entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • net9.0-ios-Release-arm64-NativeAOT_Release-OSX.13.Amd64.Iphone.Open leg failing without running tests #95875
  • [mono][wasi] add ilgen component tasks to wasi #95874
  • Failing test - `System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest` on Linux/arm64 #95873
  • [API Proposal]: System.Security.AccessControl.ServiceRights #95868
  • Directory.EnumerateFiles() => System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #95867
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' #95866
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding Matrix operations to `System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives` #95863
  • [tvos][test] mlaunch exited with 0, when test passed #95862
  • Normalized Spinwait on CPUs with P/E Cores #95849
  • JIT can reuse a comparison between two locals but fails to do so for two readonly fields #95844
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #95843
  • Test failure Interop/COM/NETClients/Primitives/NETClientPrimitives/NETClientPrimitives.cmd #95842

Closed

  • Assert in FrozenObjectNode.EncodeData #95852
  • [wasm] Add WasmSingleFileBundle for browser-wasm projects too #95480
    9.0.0
  • HttpResponseMessage does not contain Content-Type and Content-Length headers in DelegatingHandler #95708
  • The input string 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Byte>[2]' was not in a correct format. #95044
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Dictionary and Hashset on 9/24/2022 1:05:07 PM #76256
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.IPNetwork parse CIDR issue #95865
  • [wasm] Setting `maxParallelDownloads` sometimes has no effect #95491
    8.0.x
  • Does AOT plan to support EMIT in the future #95841
  • crossgen2 failure in VMR when using VMR stage 2 build scenario #95768
  • [NativeAOT] EventPipe current_thread_get_id performance #86828
    9.0.0
  • NTLM header authentication stopped remembering passwords #95848
  • Xamarin.Android 支持 System.IO.Ports #80352
    Future
  • TrimmerRootDescriptor is not able to preserve generic instantiations #95058
  • Issue with Delegate Pointers in .NET Core AOT using EasyHook #95624
  • Why use ‘call CORINFO_HELP_DBL2ULNG’ when double to ulong instead of vcvttsd2si #95846

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: clear loop iter info after rebuilding loops for opt repeat #95879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix lifetime management of certificates with keys on macOS #95878
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Use 'compOpportunisticallyDependsOn' to determine if we can use ArmBase_Arm64_MultiplyLongAdd/MultiplyLongSub/MultiplyLongNeg intrinsics in lowering #95877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder (#93115)" #95872
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Fix OSR DFS assert, and update entry BB for try regions #95871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Minimal legacy support for Blazor renderBatch #95869
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95861
    Servicing-consider, os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Remove dotnet8 feeds from NuGet.config #95860
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Invalidate loop table after unrolling and dominators after MarkLocalVars #95854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Update the place where we assert about `align` presence while removing jump to next instr #95845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Port loop alignment to new loop representation #95836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm/wasi] Consolidate build targets #95775
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move `StartupHooks` tests and remaining uses of PortableApp project to pre-built test assets #95761
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Android] Bump target SDK version for Android sample #95770
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix FormatException error message when parsing invalid UTF8 inputs #95133
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AH_3A #95864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix duplicate subgraph clauses in flow graph dumping, minor loop cleanup #95850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Recanonicalize entry BB in JitOptRepeat scenarios #95857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-Tracing-coreclr and area-UWP owners #95766
    area-Meta
  • [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95793
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix visibility error XUW1003 in tests: #95851
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][full-aot] Fix runtime invoke with delegate parameter #95824
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95757
    os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR/Mono #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics thread to be walked by the GC #95837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Move some runtime code to a separate runtime.h/runtime.c… #95834
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable finalizer thread, run most tests in threadpool #95783
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • workloads: Don't use wasm workload if PublishAot=true for nativeaot #95777
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.71, windows: 120.0.6099.71 #95832
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • use enclosing type cls handle for VN of static gc/non-gc helper #95840
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization fix localized DisplayName and LanguageName #95786
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Merge more stores/loads #95823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • The problem with memory cache threads has been fixed #95230
    area-Extensions-Caching, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
